<p>ATG Store, and its affiliated Home store is an online retailer offering a wide variety of high-quality, brand-name merchandise at discount prices, including furniture, home decor, watches, jewelry, clothing, shoes, and accessories. We give customers an opportunity to shop for bargains conveniently, while offering manufacturers, distributors and other retailers an alternative sales channel.</p>

<p>ATG Store, and its affiliated Home store is an online retailer offering a wide variety of high-quality, brand-name merchandise at discount prices, including furniture, home decor, watches, jewelry, clothing, shoes, and accessories. We give customers an opportunity to shop for bargains conveniently, while offering manufacturers, distributors and other retailers an alternative sales channel.</p>

<p>You will find an Apparel Size&#160;Picker on the product page for all apparel items. We strongly encourage you to review&#160;the sizing guide for recommended body measurements for the size you are considering.&#160;</p> <p>Modern size apparel is contemporary in style and the overall cut is smaller.&#160;The&#160;German sizing guide converts&#160;German sizes into U.S. sizes. Please refer to the item's product page to see what sizing chart is appropriate for your specific item.</p>
Due to manufacturer packaging changes, product packaging may vary from the image shown for the&#160;clothing item that you have chosen.

<p style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold">How do I know my own shoe size?</p> <p>If you are unsure of your shoe size, try to use a ruler to get an approximate measurement. However, because the foot is three dimensional, this may not be a completely accurate measurement. Please keep in mind that manufacturers use different measures to construct their shoes and sizing may vary accordingly. Our recommendation is to try on a few shoes in an actual brick and mortar store to get an idea of what your size is.</p>
Due to manufacturer packaging changes, product packaging may vary from the image shown for the shoe style that you have chosen.
How to View Your Order History

<p>You can only view your account history if you have registered on our site. If you are a registered user, you can view and manage your account and order information. Log into "Account" (located at the top right hand corner of the Home Page). You can manage your profile, payment information, address book, orders, wishlist and gift lists from the account management page.</p> <p><span style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Please Note:</span> International orders may not appear in your order history for up to 5 days. Internationally shipped orders will not show tracking information until your item(s) leave the U.S. hub. Items may take up to 10 business days to reach the U.S. hub.</p>

<p><span style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Before Shopping:</span> Click on the Login link located at the top of the&#160; homepage. Under the heading <span style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold">New Customer</span>, enter your email address and click on "Create My Account". Create and confirm your password and enter name and other optional details. Click&#160;"Create My Account" again&#160;to complete your account set up.</p> <p><span style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold">During the Checkout Process:</span> From your shopping cart, click the "Continue Checkout" button. Under the heading&#160;<span style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold">New Customer&#160;</span>enter your email address. Create and confirm your password. Click "Create My Account" again to complete your account set up.</p>
